column4: @ yabai_ on f7, I don't get a login prompt. I want to start openbox. so I was wondering if that is possible to get a loginprompt on f7 so I can start a gui
do you have OB installed?  try running "startx" if you do.
I can't do startx since all the screen shows are the commands it runs and stops at "Started MySql server" and doesn't allow me to login
did you disable all your VTs somehow?  nothing on alt+f1 -> alt+f6?
